message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses the problem of catastrophic forgetting in artificial neural networks (ANNs) and proposes a solution using diffusion-based neuromodulation. This topic falls under the sub-category of neural networks (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the broader goal of producing agents that can continuously learn and improve their skills, which falls under the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses a diagnostic problem to test the effectiveness of the proposed solution, which could fall under the sub-category of computer vision (cs.CV).
